title: Can't purchase Rp
body: So I went to 7-eleven and they had no more 10/25 rp cards. So i got a NETSPEND Visa card and i activated and everything. And it's refusing to let me purchase rp. I better of fucking not just wasted ten dollars.

replies.body:
It should work if you've 100% activated it and added contact/billing info to the card on the [Netspend website.](https://www.netspend.com/)

What issue are you seeing? Can you [send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/)?
